```{r}
#| label: load
library(dplyr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| label: view
df <- penguins |>
  na.omit() |>
  filter(species == params$species, island == params$island)
```

## Body Mass

The body masses of `r params$species` penguins observed on `r params$island` island from `r min(df$year)` to `r max(df$year)` are summarised on @fig-plot-mass. The orange point with error bars represents mean values with a 95% confidence interval.

```{r}
#| label: fig-plot-mass
#| fig-cap: Body Mass of {{< meta title >}}
ggplot(df, aes(x = sex, y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = .8) +
  geom_jitter(width = .2, alpha = .5) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = 'mean_cl_boot', colour = '#E95420') +
  labs(x = 'Sex', y = 'Body mass (g)') +
  theme_light()
```
